eu.ehri.extension

Class ToolsResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ehri.extension.AbstractRestResource
      • eu.ehri.extension.ToolsResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TxCheckedResource

    public class ToolsResource
extends AbstractRestResource
    Miscellaneous additional functionality that doesn't fit anywhere else.
    Author:
    Mike Bryant (http://github.com/mikesname)

    • Method Detail

      • autoLinkRepositoryDocs

        public long autoLinkRepositoryDocs(String repositoryId,
                                   String vocabularyId,
                                   List<String> accessPointTypes,
                                   String languageCode,
                                   boolean excludeSingle,
                                   boolean tolerant)
                            throws ItemNotFound,
                                   BadRequester,
                                   ValidationError,
                                   PermissionDenied,
                                   DeserializationError
        Create concepts and links derived from the access points on a repository's documentary units.
        Parameters:
        repositoryId - the repository id
        vocabularyId - the target vocabulary
        languageCode - the language code of created concepts
        accessPointTypes - the access point types to process
        tolerant - proceed even if there are integrity errors due to slug collisions in the created concepts
        excludeSingle - don't create concepts/links for access points that are unique to a single item
        Returns:
        the number of links created
        Throws:
        ItemNotFound
        BadRequester
        ValidationError
        PermissionDenied
        DeserializationError

      • renamePropertyValueRE

        public long renamePropertyValueRE(String entityType,
                                  String propName,
                                  String regex,
                                  String replace)
                           throws Exception
        Find an replace a regex-specified substring of a property value across an entire entity class e.g. if an Address has a property with name "url" and value "www.foo.com/bar", providing a regex value ^www and replacement http://www will give the property a value of "http://www.foo.com/bar".

        Warning: This is a sharp tool! Back up the whole database first!

        Parameters:
        entityType - The type of entity
        propName - The name of the property to find and replace
        regex - A regex specifying a substring of the property value
        replace - A replacement substring
        Returns:
        How many items have been changed
        Throws:
        Exception

      • renamePropertyName

        public long renamePropertyName(String entityType,
                               String oldKeyName,
                               String newKeyName)
                        throws Exception
        Change a property key name across an entire entity class.

        Warning: This is a sharp tool! Back up the whole database first!

        Parameters:
        entityType - The type of entity
        oldKeyName - The existing property key name
        newKeyName - The new property key name
        Returns:
        The number of items changed
        Throws:
        Exception

      • renamePropertyValue

        public long renamePropertyValue(String entityType,
                                String propName,
                                String oldValue,
                                String newValue)
                         throws Exception
        Find an replace a property value across an entire entity class, e.g. if a DocumentaryUnit has a property with name "foo" and value "bar", change the value to "baz" on all items.

        Warning: This is a sharp tool! Back up the whole database first!

        Parameters:
        entityType - The type of entity
        propName - The name of the property to find and replace
        oldValue - The property value to change
        newValue - The new value
        Returns:
        How many items have been changed
        Throws:
        Exception

      • regenerateId

        public String regenerateId(String id,
                           boolean collisions,
                           boolean tolerant,
                           boolean commit)
                    throws ItemNotFound,
                           IOException,
                           IdRegenerator.IdCollisionError
        Regenerate the hierarchical graph ID for a given item, optionally renaming it. The default mode is to output items whose IDs would change, without actually changing them. The collisions parameter will only output items that would cause collisions if renamed, whereas tolerant mode will skip them altogether. The commit flag will cause renaming to take place.
        Parameters:
        id - the item's existing ID
        collisions - only output items that if renamed to the regenerated ID would cause collisions
        tolerant - skip items that could cause collisions rather then throwing an error
        commit - whether or not to rename the item
        Returns:
        a tab old-to-new mapping, or an empty body if nothing was changed
        Throws:
        ItemNotFound
        IOException
        IdRegenerator.IdCollisionError

      • regenerateIdsForType

        public String regenerateIdsForType(String type,
                                   boolean collisions,
                                   boolean tolerant,
                                   boolean commit)
                            throws IOException,
                                   IdRegenerator.IdCollisionError
        Regenerate the hierarchical graph ID all items of a given type. The default mode is to output items whose IDs would change, without actually changing them. The collisions parameter will only output items that would cause collisions if renamed, whereas tolerant mode will skip them altogether. The commit flag will cause renaming to take place.
        Parameters:
        type - the item type
        collisions - only output items that if renamed to the regenerated ID would cause collisions
        tolerant - skip items that could cause collisions rather then throwing an error
        commit - whether or not to rename the items
        Returns:
        a tab list old-to-new mappings, or an empty body if nothing was changed
        Throws:
        IOException
        IdRegenerator.IdCollisionError

      • regenerateIdsForScope

        public String regenerateIdsForScope(String scopeId,
                                    boolean collisions,
                                    boolean tolerant,
                                    boolean commit)
                             throws IOException,
                                    ItemNotFound,
                                    IdRegenerator.IdCollisionError
        Regenerate the hierarchical graph ID for all items within the permission scope and lower levels. The default mode is to output items whose IDs would change, without actually changing them. The collisions parameter will only output items that would cause collisions if renamed, whereas tolerant mode will skip them altogether. The commit flag will cause renaming to take place.
        Parameters:
        scopeId - the scope item's ID
        collisions - only output items that if renamed to the regenerated ID would cause collisions
        tolerant - skip items that could cause collisions rather then throwing an error
        commit - whether or not to rename the items
        Returns:
        a tab list old-to-new mappings, or an empty body if nothing was changed
        Throws:
        ItemNotFound
        IOException
        IdRegenerator.IdCollisionError

      • regenerateDescriptionIds

        public String regenerateDescriptionIds(int bufferSize,
                                       boolean commit)
                                throws IOException,
                                       ItemNotFound,
                                       IdRegenerator.IdCollisionError
        Regenerate description IDs.
        Throws:
        ItemNotFound
        IOException
        IdRegenerator.IdCollisionError

                          throws IOException,

                                 IdRegenerator.IdCollisionError

        IdRegenerator.IdCollisionError
